backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, templates, bio pages, storage mixins, access control, and system template seeds with ID generation helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing routing, hooks, UI components, and template data sources.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus extensive OKLCH CSS variable theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, auth guards, and the main app layout with themed header and footer.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Responsive header with login/logout, subscription badge, navigation links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LinksEditor.tsx: Form component for adding, editing, and removing link items within the bio page editor.
frontend/src/components/PaymentQrUploade: React component for uploading and previewing a QR image using ExternalBlob with progress tracking and removal support.
frontend/src/components/SocialHandlesEdi: Editor UI for adding, updating, and removing social handles with platform selection and input fields.
frontend/src/components/TemplateCard.tsx: Displays a template preview card with thumbnail, metadata, and a button to navigate to the template details page.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Exports a constant list of category strings and a CategoryType union type.
frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts: Provides a large seed array of default Template objects used as fallback when backend templates are unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity loading through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, templates, subscriptions, and bio page data, with seed fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus base utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements UPI-based subscription checkout flow with payment reference submission and subscription activation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with login flow and navigation to pricing or templates.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows subscription tiers and pricing, allowing users to start checkout for Premium or Pro plans.
frontend/src/pages/SharedBioPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a public shared bio page with social handles and links or an error state.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Provides a profile signup form and submits user details to create a new profile.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.ts: Displays details for a selected template, handles subscription gating, and allows navigating to copy or customize the template.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateEditorPage.ts: Provides a form-based editor to customize a template and save a bio page, including link handling and share URL generation.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Shows a gallery of templates with category filtering and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTemplatePage.ts: Allows Pro users to upload new templates with metadata and thumbnail handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, version, and a list of implemented features including backend canisters, frontend scaffolding, authentication, and UI pages for templates, pricing, signup, and uploads. Serves as a structured inventory of existing functionality for a subscription-based template marketplace.
